item.title: California Finally Ends Political Prosecution Of Journalists Who Uncovered Aborted Baby Parts Trafficking
item.description: The Center for Medical Progress recorded Planned Parenthood abortionists telling how they harvest and sell babies' bodies for profit and research.

item.title: Why Congress Needs To Swiftly Pass Concealed-Carry Reciprocity
item.description: Unlike other parts of the Constitution, the Second Amendment has been politicized to the point it is often treated as a second-class right.

item.title: SCOTUS To Decide If Parents Can Reject LGBT Brainwashing For Their Children
item.description: To protect their religious beliefs and their children's innocence, these Montgomery County parents are taking their fight to SCOTUS.

item.title: RFK Jr. Can Shore Up Support And Save Women With This Common-Sense Stance On Abortion Pills

item.title: Trump’s J6 Pardons Signal The End Of The War On Wrongthink
item.description: The Capitol riot fueled the war on wrongthink. Clemency for Capitol rioters should represent the start of the end of that war.
